snippet: Representative Charles B. Rangel and his main challenger, State Senator Adriano D. Espaillat, lashed out at each other on Friday during their first televised debate.
abstract: Rep Charles B Rangel and his top rival, State Sen Adriano D Espaillat, lash out at each other during their first televised debate; Rangel, who is turning 84, will face not only Espaillat but also Rev Michael A Walrond in the Democratic primary on June 24; both Espaillat and Walrond argue that Rangel, after 22 terms in office, has lost touch with his constituents.
lead_paragraph: Representative Charles B. Rangel and his main challenger, State Senator Adriano D. Espaillat, lashed out at each other on Friday during their first televised debate.

headline.main: In Debate, Rangel Irritates His Main Challenger, Along With the Moderator
headline.print_headline: In Debate, Rangel Irritates His Main Challenger, Along With the Moderator
